title: ASIAGO AND PROSCIUTTO TOASTS
directions: Combine Asiago, Hellmann's速 or Best Foods速 Organic Garlic Mayonnaise and prosciutto in small bowl.
Spread cheese mixture evenly on baguette slices, then arrange on baking sheet.
Broil until golden, about 3 minutes. Arrange toasts on serving platter, then drizzle with balsamic glaze and sprinkle with basil.
ingredients: 1/3 cup Hellmann's速 or Best Foods速 Organic Garlic Mayonnaise
2 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto, about 5 slices, chopped
1 loaf (12-in.) French baguette, sliced into 18 pieces
